markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bone Investiture](/Feats.aspx?ID=2412) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur. You can cast [_dinosaur form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=72) on yourself as a 5th-level primal innate spell once per day.
name: Bone Investiture
